name: Titan Force (Prototype)
description:
Titan Force 

===============================================================

Titan Force Underground is a Action-Platformer. Collect Steampunk weapons and fight enemys. Random generated Dungeons, random loot, random monsters.

This is a Beta version of the game. Please give me some feedback after playing it. 

Thanks. 

===============================================================

Controlls:

move: W,A,S,D

jump: Spacebar (doublejump)

slide/warp: F

shoot: left mouse 

reload: R
